function.name: MatrixPushEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_MatrixPushEXT(ctx, matrixMode);

function.name: MatrixPopEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_MatrixPopEXT(ctx, matrixMode);

function.name: ClientAttribDefaultEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientAttribDefault(ctx, mask);

function.name: PushClientAttribDefaultEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_PushClientAttrib(ctx, mask, true);

function.name: MultiTexCoordPointerEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_AttribPointer(ctx, VERT_ATTRIB_TEX(texunit - GL_TEXTURE0), MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 0, 0, 0), stride, pointer);

function.name: EnableClientStateiEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientState(ctx, NULL, VERT_ATTRIB_TEX(index), true);

function.name: DisableClientStateiEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientState(ctx, NULL, VERT_ATTRIB_TEX(index), false);

function.name: VertexArrayVertexOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_POS, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 0, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayColorOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_COLOR0, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 1, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayEdgeFlagOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_EDGEFLAG, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 1, 0, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayIndexOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_COLOR_INDEX, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, 1, 0, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayNormalOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_NORMAL, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, 3, 1, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayTexCoordOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_TEX(ctx->GLThread.ClientActiveTexture), MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 0, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayMultiTexCoordOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_TEX(texunit - GL_TEXTURE0), MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 0, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayFogCoordOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_FOG, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, 1, 0, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArraySecondaryColorOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_COLOR1, MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 1, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayVertexAttribOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_GENERIC(index), MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, normalized, 0, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: VertexArrayVertexAttribIOffsetEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_DSAAttribPointer(ctx, vaobj, buffer, VERT_ATTRIB_GENERIC(index), MESA_PACK_VFORMAT(type, size, 0, 1, 0), stride, offset);

function.name: EnableVertexArrayEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientState(ctx, &vaobj, _mesa_array_to_attrib(ctx, array), true);

function.name: DisableVertexArrayEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientState(ctx, &vaobj, _mesa_array_to_attrib(ctx, array), false);

function.name: EnableVertexArrayAttribEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientState(ctx, &vaobj, VERT_ATTRIB_GENERIC(index), true);

function.name: DisableVertexArrayAttribEXT
function.marshal_call_after: _mesa_glthread_ClientState(ctx, &vaobj, VERT_ATTRIB_GENERIC(index), false);
